title: How to Make Falooda Kulfi

steps.headline: Blend all the ingredients in your blender.
Pour the mixture into a large container.
Soak the basil seeds in water for two hours.
Drain the water out of the basil seeds.
Boil the vermicelli, drain the water out of it, and let it cool for some time(it's best to refrigerate it by putting it in a container and snapping its lid in place so it won't get stiff by cooling).
Place three glasses on your countertop.
steps.description: You'll need to divide your ingredients in thirds.

steps.headline: Scoop some kulfi into the glasses.

text: For the kulfi Blend all the ingredients in your blender.  Pour the mixture into a large container.  Freeze it for 24 hours.  For the falooda Soak the basil seeds in water for two hours.  Drain the water out of the basil seeds.  Boil the vermicelli, drain the water out of it, and let it cool for some time(it's best to refrigerate it by putting it in a container and snapping its lid in place so it won't get stiff by cooling).  Place three glasses on your countertop. You'll need to divide your ingredients in thirds. Add the vermicelli.  Scoop some kulfi into the glasses.  Sprinkle the basil seeds in.  Pour the rose syrup.  Pour the milk as well.
